news_articles.title: Record-Breaking Heatwave Sweeps Across Southern Europe
news_articles.summary: Multiple countries experience temperatures exceeding 45°C, causing widespread health warnings and increased wildfire risks.
news_articles.full_text: Southern European countries are battling an unprecedented heatwave that has pushed temperatures to dangerous levels. Spain, Italy, and Greece have issued extreme heat alerts, with meteorologists warning of potential long-term climate change implications.

image.caption: Scorching temperatures impact Southern European cities

news_articles.title: Tropical Storm Develops in Caribbean, Potential Hurricane Formation
news_articles.summary: Meteorological services track developing storm with potential to become a Category 2 hurricane in coming days.
news_articles.full_text: The National Hurricane Center is closely monitoring a tropical disturbance that has shown increasing organization and potential for rapid intensification.

image.caption: Satellite imagery of developing tropical storm

news_articles.title: Unprecedented Rainfall Causes Massive Flooding in Southeast Asia
news_articles.summary: Monsoon season brings record-breaking precipitation, displacing thousands and causing significant infrastructure damage.
news_articles.full_text: Countries like Thailand and Vietnam are experiencing monsoon rains far beyond historical averages, leading to widespread flooding and humanitarian concerns.

image.caption: Extensive flooding in urban and rural areas

news_articles.summary: International panel releases comprehensive report detailing accelerating global temperature increases and environmental impacts.
news_articles.full_text: Scientists from 50 countries collaborate to provide the most comprehensive analysis of global climate trends, emphasizing immediate intervention requirements.

news_articles.summary: Advanced meteorological satellite launched, promising more accurate and timely severe weather warnings.
news_articles.full_text: NASA and European Space Agency collaborate on next-generation weather monitoring satellite with unprecedented prediction capabilities.
